category: National Team Athletesâ€™ Village Operation Regulations/Article 17 (No approval for temporary use)
contents: Article 17 (Non-approval for temporary use) The athlete village head shall not approve temporary use in any of the following cases. 1. When it is judged that there is a risk of disrupting the national team training atmosphere. 2. When it is judged that there is a problem with the management of the facility. 3. When it is judged that approval for temporary use is inappropriate, such as use for commercial activities.
